price: Or do they say, “There is madness in him?” Rather, he has come to them with the truth, but most of them are averse to the truth.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۚ بَلۡ جَآءَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ
